attributes.action: Make self defence lessons in with Pe classes
attributes.additional_details: As a survivor of a violent gang rape I know how important it is to know how to protect ourselves,  bringing self defence basic classes in with pe classes.  There is so much crime and bad things in the world I want all children to know how to protect themselves.... Age 11+ I was thinking would be a good age to start
attributes.background:
Children need to learn basic self defence because of knife crime, rape, abuse..
It should be brought in with pe lessons
